title: Stop Toxic Housing Website
text: Website I built for a professor at Notre Dame for a cause dedicated to fighting to prevent a dangerous housing development in East Pasadena, CA. Built using GatsbyJS.

title: Perception
text: A website I built as a freelancing project for a company called Perception Web Management. Built using Bootstrap, FontAwesome, and jQuery.

title: ND Adventure
text: RPG/Adventure game based on Notre Dame's computer science department. Built with Pygame.

title: Frogger Clone
text: Frogger clone built with C++ and a custom graphics library based on X11.

title: PCeption
text: Final project for my computer graphics course. In it, we designed an interactive laptop model using WebGL and the three.js library.

title: Predicting the 2018 Midterm
text: Data science project that uses multiple models to predict the 2018 US House of Representatives midterm. Built with Python.

title: Multimedia Entertainment Tier Heuristic
text: Gives info on movies. Sort of like IMDb, but with a weird name and way less features, functionality, and info. Built with Elm and Crystal.

title: Nightingale
text: Final project for a Social Sensing and Cyber-Physical Systems course. The application creates poetry out of tweets. Built with Python and React.

title: Sentiment Analysis Web Application
text: A sentiment analysis application that gauges public opinion of a company and correlates it with stock price. Built with Node.js and Python.
